user_query: Can you please give me the transaction histories for my Crypto grana account? I would like to view the fourth page with 35 transactions per page. Also, provide the current positions for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin.

TaskList.description: Fetch transaction histories for the user's Crypto grana account, specifically retrieving the fourth page with 35 transactions.
Retrieve current positions for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin.
